name: Hot Apple Strudels
description: These little pastries remind us of caramel apples!
preparation: Preheat a frying pan over medium-high heat. Add apples, and Apple Pie Spice. Sauté for 3–4 minutes, stirring constantly, until apples are a little soft. Set aside.
On a Sheet Pan Liner, roll puff pastry into a 10.5” square. Gently flip. Using a rolling pin, firmly roll over to cut pastry into triangles.
Spoon apple mixture onto each triangle: 1⁄2 tsp for small, 1–2 tsp for large. Starting at wide end, roll up each strudel.
Place on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner. Using a basting brush, brush with milk, and bake until puffy and light golden: 10–11 minutes for small, 12–14 minutes for large.
tips: Once cool, garnish with a drizzle of caramel sauce and a sprinkle of icing sugar, just before serving.

products.name: Apple Pie Spice
summary: Move over pumpkin spice; it's time for Apple Pie Spice to shine! Perfect for leveling up the taste of fall-inspired baking, it's also great on top of oatmeal, in a frothy late or smoothie – or anywhere you want a punch of apple pie flavour.

products.name: Cinnamon (Ground)
summary: A simple blend of organic cinnamon that brings the flavor. Great for baking, desserts, egg nog, or enhancing the taste of Middle Eastern and Indian dishes.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
